string-array.name: paintings_titles
string-array.item: Indoor mobile robot for package delivery

string-array.name: paintings_lang
string-array.item: MatLab, C# WinForm, PHP, Android JAVA, Arduino

string-array.name: paintings_description
string-array.item: Part of the graduation project, main goal to send some items and location witch user selected to the server. Material design GUI. Server side implemented using PHP. Connected with online database implemented by PDO. Very good UI/UX design. Polling HTTP request from the server.

Graduation project. An application on the tasks that can be done automatically using the self-driving robots. using a mobile robot (small wheeled car) with self-driving capability. In addition to the robot there is a mobile application (DeliveBot) to enable the users to requests their orders.

Image processing software for automatically detect object boundary similar to Adobe Photoshop’s Magnetic Lasso tool. Applied for graph algorithms, construction and image processing concept practicing.
Using socket programing and multithreading for connecting two or more player’s laptop to each other and play a synchronized fully functional game.
Used files to store the data \n Used the most concept of OOP and some design pattern.
